abstract: New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick and quarterback Tom Brady hold press conference to address issue of underinflated footballs used in AFC championship game; neither admits to knowing anything about balls, which are easier to throw and to catch than ones that meet league standards.
lead_paragraph: Patriots Coach Bill Belichick said he had never talked to anyone about football air pressure, and quarterback Tom Brady said he was as shocked as Belichick by the accusations.

byline.contributor: Ken Belson contributed reporting from New York.

snippet: Patriots Coach Bill Belichick said he had never talked to anyone about football air pressure, and quarterback Tom Brady said he was as shocked as Belichick by the accusations.

headline.main: Tom Brady and Bill Belichick Deny Knowledge of Deflated Footballs
headline.print_headline: Belichick and Brady Offer No Explanation
